entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as speaking and ignoring Snape. He is described as being polite.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as shaking his head and having his lip curling. He is ignored by Professor Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as saying 'No' vehemently. He is accused of lying by Madame Maxime.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is mentioned as accusing Harry of lying and suggesting that Dumbledore made a mistake with the Age Line.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as saying that Harry could not have crossed the Age Line.

relationships.description: Madame Maxime accuses Harry of lying.
McGonagall asserts that Harry could not have crossed the Age Line.
